#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
int main()
{
	long long N;
	scanf("%lld",&N);
	getchar();
	char *s=new char[N+1];
	scanf("%s",s);
	double A,F;
	scanf("%lf%lf",&A,&F);
	long long len=strlen(s);
	double totalangle=0.0;
	bool flag=true;
	for(long long i=0;i<len;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]=='L')
		{
			totalangle-=A;
		}
		else
		{
			totalangle+=A;
		}
		if(fabs(totalangle)>F)
		{
			flag=false;
			break;
		}
	}
	if(flag==true)
	{
		puts("YES");
	}
	else
	{
		puts("NO");
	}
	return 0;
}
